dict.string: This application makes use of the following third party libraries:

License ============== Do whatever you want with this code. I only ask that you check out [Dash](http://kapeli.com/dash), my Snippet Manager and Documentation Browser app.
HighlightedWebView ==================
Drop-in WebView subclass that adds Safari-style in-page search-result highlighting.
![Screenshot](https://github.com/Kapeli/HighlightedWebView/raw/master/Preview.png)
Features: ========= * Highlight search results. * Show position of search results by highlighting the scrollbar. * Maintain text size (zoom level) between launches.
Project Goals: ============== * Avoid JavaScript. * Avoid blocking the main thread as much as possible.
